children.name: Team
children.info: Opportunities regarding team dynamics and collaboration.

children.name: Skills optimization
info: Is there any individual improvement that leads to a strong team and organization?
What skills will be critical in 6–12 months that we should start building now?
Where have we recently succeeded because of a specific skill—how do we replicate that?
If we had a learning budget/time box, where would we invest it first and why?

children.name: Work-model optimization
info: How can we optimize work models to better suit the needs of the team?
What rituals (standups, demos, retro, office hours) actually add value and which don’t? Are there other rituals we should consider?
Which policies are compliance-driven vs. habit? What can be simplified without risk?

children.name: Organisation
children.info: Questions about structures, processes and support within Airbus.

children.name: Risk, Compliance & Security
info: Which key risks lack mapped controls—or have redundant/ineffective controls?
Where are controls manual today; what can we automate or continuously monitor?
How fast do we detect and respond by incident type, and where are the biggest delays?
How resilient are we to disruptions and upcoming changes?

children.name: Academic & Research Partnerships
info: How can joint projects with academia open new frontiers in R&D?
What collaborative initiatives could enhance knowledge exchange and innovation?
How can we create internships, industrial PhDs, residencies, or adjunct roles tied to our needs?
What specific research questions, if solved, would unlock step-change outcomes?
Which labs/centers lead in those domains, and what uniquely differentiates them?

children.name: (New) Market Segments
info: What alternatives do they use now (competitors, in-house, workaround), and why do they stick with them?
How large is the reachable segment (TAM/SAM/SOM) and how fast is it growing?
What are the key pain points or unmet needs within these segments?
What product gaps would block a sale today, and what’s the smallest viable enhancement to unblock?
What success metrics define product-market fit here (activation, usage depth, expansion, payback)?

children.name: Innovation Culture Development (Incubation)
info: What internal ideas or employee-driven projects could lead to breakthrough opportunities?
How can adopting emerging technologies open competitive opportunities?
What cultural changes would create opportunities for faster innovation adoption across the company?
Where do ideas currently come from, and which voices are systematically missing?
What’s our standard for customer/partner co-creation—how early and how often do we involve them?
What’s the role of internal mentors/coaches do innovators know where to get help?
Where do tool/process choices slow innovation?

children.name: Environment
children.info: Questions about the external context and constraints.

children.name: Sustainability
info: Which materials have the heaviest footprint—what recycled/low-carbon substitutes exist? Where can we design for circularity?
How can renewable sources of energy be used to support operations?
How can we tie team goals/bonuses to measurable sustainability KPIs?
How can we optimize workloads, data retention, or hosting regions to lower energy and cost?
Which sites or lines could move to renewable electricity soonest?

children.name: Market Attractiveness
info: How can we expand customer segments by identifying patterns of competitors?
Who are the main competitors operating in this market, and what is their market share?
How much pricing power exists in this market for different business models?

children.name: Product
info: How can the product differentiate itself from competitors through unique features, technology, or service quality?
How adaptable is the product to evolving regulations, regional demands, and future market trends?
What core outcomes does the product deliver today, and which high-value outcomes are still unmet?
How easy is switching from incumbents, what would lower switching costs?
Where do the support tickets cluster?

children.name: Industry attractiveness
info: What unique features can you offer ?
Where do network effects, standards, or platform lock-in shape competitive advantage?
How fragmented vs. consolidated is the industry, and how is it trending?

children.name: Regional/Geographical
info: What opportunities exist to set up manufacturing or operational bases in low-investment or cost-advantage regions?
What opportunities arise from leveraging regional trade agreements, government incentives, or subsidies?
What opportunities exist to adapt the product or service to regional cultural, economic, or infrastructure needs?
How do competitor strengths differ by region?
